sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input  
         id="input"
         class="input_class"  
         :class="[classValue]"
         :type="type"
         :value="modelValue"
         :placeholder="placeholder"
         @input="$emit('update:modelValue', $event.target.value)"
         />
  


</template>
<script>

export default {
    props: {
        label: {
            type: String,
            default:'',
        },
        borderdiv: {
            type: String,
            default:'',
        },
        modelValue: {
            type:[String,Number],
            default:'',
        },
        placeholder: {
            type: String,
            default:'',
        },
        type: {
            type: String,
            default:'',
        },
        labelBorder: {
            type:[String,Number],
            default:'',
        },
        classValue: {
            type:[String,Number],
            default:'',
        },
    },
    setup() {
        
    }

  
}
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Dosis');

.input_class{
  border: 10px solid;
  border-image-slice: 1;
  border-width: 5px;
  padding: 10px;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  width: 100%;
  border-width: 3px;
  border-style: solid;
  border-image-source: linear-gradient(to left, #743ad5, #d53a9d);
}
.p15{
   padding: 15px
}
.border_radius{
  border-radius: 5px;
}

.border_radius1{
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.border_radius2{
  border-radius: 20px;
}
.border_radius3{
  border-radius: 50%;
}
</style>
